title: Diane Finstein, "Ganman," quote.
subtitle: The Senator of California didn't say, "When an armed man realizes that no one else is armed, he will lay down his arms and surrender himself, that is human nature."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Senator Diane Finstein said, "When an armed man realizes that no one else is armed, he will lay down his arms and turn himself in, this is human nature."
